title: Enhancing Learning Design Practical Competencies: Blended Learning and Group Assessment for Evidence-Based Math Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate the ability to critically evaluate the validity of mathematical arguments with over 80% accuracy through VR simulations

In groups of 3–4, learners can develop one evidence-based mathematical activity design applicable to real corporate training settings and achieve ≥4 points (5-point scale) in ≥two of three predefined evaluation criteria (educational effectiveness, feasibility, evidence-based validity).

Within three weeks, learners can analyze three digital resources (videos, quizzes) and two real-world cases (corporate success/failure examples) in a blended learning environment (online platform + offline workshop) and submit a teaching-learning strategy design plan achieving ≥80% learner engagement.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
